name:
Step 5: Leave the Warp: -20 Perception Test at Destination, success deposits ship where intended, failiure causes off-target exit.
When ship reaches destination, Navigator makes -20 Perception Test. On success the ship exits the warp at a safe, desired location. If failing, they exit off target, and possibly dangerously close to a planetary body or some other undesired location.

system.adept: Some occupied systems may not take kindly to off-target warp translations. Exact effects are GM dependant, generally shouldn't be lethal, that isn't fun.

description.value: Adept: Some occupied systems may not take kindly to off-target warp translations. Exact effects are GM dependant, generally shouldn't be lethal, that isn't fun.
